metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010043 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Quake3e < 5ed740d is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: Possiblecode execution and denial of service. The component is: Argument stringcreation.

criterions.comment: ioquake3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
